snippet: The retreat in Williamsburg, Va. was most notable for Representative Paul D. Ryan’s front-and-center role, belying expectations that he would lie low as he mulls a 2016 presidential bid.
abstract: Reporter's Notebook column highlights what went on during House Republican retreat in Williamsburg, Va; says event was most notable for Rep Paul D Ryan's front-and-center role, belying expectations that he would lie low as he mulls a 2016 presidential bid.
lead_paragraph: The retreat in Williamsburg, Va. was most notable for Representative Paul D. Ryan’s front-and-center role, belying expectations that he would lie low as he mulls a 2016 presidential bid.

headline.seo: Ryan Returns to Spotlight at Republican Retreat
headline.main: Ryan Returns to Spotlight at House Republican Retreat
headline.print_headline: Ryan Returns to Spotlight at House Republican Retreat
